QuestData.Title: A Deeper Dive
QuestData.Description:
Something just isn't adding up about these Amathet. Why would protectors of titan works attack and damage the Forge of Origination?
I think we need tae take a closer look. I think I saw a monument on the terrace over there. Perhaps the writings there could tell us more about these tol'vir.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend High Explorer Dellorah as she deciphers the Amathet Monument at Sunstone Terrace.
